ReferenceDocuments.name: What is the [DATEST] treatmen
ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the [DATEST] treatment label identifier?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DAREFID
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable. May be used to create RELREC to link this record with a record in EX domain.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This packaging identifier (e.g., kit number, bottle label, vial identifier) may be collected in different ways (e.g., affixing label onto CRF or scanning a bar code). For some study dosing regimens, greater granularity for treatment identifiers may be needed. In this situation, sponsors may need to use additional variables. This CDASH variable name is an example of what "variable name" can be used in a denormalized data structure.
